title: Fireside with the Underboss - "He Told Joe Watts If You Touch Sammy's Son I will Kill You"
description: During Sammy's time in the ADX Supermax, agents ask Sammy to testify against Joe Watts and he agrees. This starts a bit of a beef between the two, and the situation escalates when Joe threatens to harm Sammy' son.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: During Sammy's time in the ADX Supermax, agents ask Sammy to testify against Joe Watts and he agrees. This starts a bit of a beef between the two, and the situation escalates when Joe threatens to harm Sammy' son.
